Sparql endpoint.description: Checking whether the server responds to a SPARQL query
Sparql endpoint.output: Offline: if the sparql endpoint is not online;  Available: if SPARQL endpoint is online.; -:The SPARQL endpoint is missing.

SPARQL endpoint URL.description: Checking whether the data is available as a SPARQL endpoint and is available for download as an RDF dump
SPARQL endpoint URL.output: url: if sparql endpoint url exists; -: if the sparql endpoint url does not exist

Availability of RDF dump (metadata).description: Checking whether an RDF dump is provided and can be downloaded
Availability of RDF dump (metadata).output: 0: The RDF dump is offline;  1: The RDF dump is online. -1: The RDF dump is missing.

Availability of RDF dump (query).description: Checking whether an RDF dump is provided and can be downloaded
Availability of RDF dump (query).output: False: The RDF dump is offline;  True: The RDF dump is online. -: The RDF dump is missing.

URL for download the dataset.description: Checking whether the data is available as a SPARQL endpoint and is available for download as an RDF dump
URL for download the dataset.input: (working) SPARQL endpoint or Metadata or VoID file
URL for download the dataset.output: []: if the sparql endpoint or rdf dump is not online;  list of links: if SPARQL endpoint and RDF dump are online.

Age of data.output: -: if the creation date can't be recovered; integer: if the creation date is correctly recovered

Modification date.description: Use of dates as the point in time of the last verification of a statement represented by dcterms:modifieds
Modification date.output: -: if the modification date can't be retrieved; date: if the modification date is correctly retrieved

Time elapsed since last modification.description: Currency only measures the time since the last modification
Time elapsed since last modification.output: -: if the modification date is not correctly retrieved or not indicated; an integer: if the modification date is correctly retrieved

Languages (query).description: Checking whether data is available in different languages
Languages (query).output: False: if no lang tag is retrieved; list of langs: if at least a lang tag is retrieved; -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Languages (metadata).description: Checking whether metadata is available in different languages
Languages (metadata).output: absent: if no lang is indicated in the metadata; list of langs: if at least a lang tag is retrieved

Serialization formats.description: checking whether data is available in different serialization formats
Serialization formats.input: (working) SPARQL endpoint or Metadata or VoID file
Serialization formats.output: []: if no serialization format is provided; list of serialization formats: if at least one serialization format is provided; -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Availability for download (query).description: Checking whether an RDF dump is provided and can be downloaded
Availability for download (query).output: False: The RDF dump is offline;  True: The RDF dump is online. -: The RDF dump is missing.

Availability for download (metadata).description: Checking whether an RDF dump is provided and can be downloaded
Availability for download (metadata).output: 0: The RDF dump is offline;  1: The RDF dump is online. -1: The RDF dump is missing.

Use HTTPS.output: False: Does not use HTTPS; True: Uses HTTPS; -: The SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Requires authentication.description: use of login credentials (or use of SSL or SSH)
Requires authentication.output: False: Authentication is not required; True: authentication required; -: The SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Average length of URIs (subject).description: detection of long URIs or those that contain query param-eters
Average length of URIs (subject).output: Average # of characters in URIs (subject). Best value: <80 characters

Average length of URIs (predicate).description: detection of long URIs or those that contain query param-eters
Average length of URIs (predicate).output: Average # of characters in URIs (predicate). Best value: <80 characters

Average length of URIs (object).description: detection of long URIs or those that contain query parameters
Average length of URIs (object).output: Average # of characters in URIs (object). Best value: <80 characters

Use RDF structures.description: detection of the non-standard usage of collections, containers and reification
Use RDF structures.output: True: if RDF structures are used; False: if RDF structures aren't used.; -: The SPARQL endpoint is missing.

License machine redeable (metadata).description: detection of the indication of a license in the VoID description or in the dataset itself
License machine redeable (metadata).output: string: the license if it can be recovered; False: the license is not indicated

License machine redeable (query).description: detection of the indication of a license in the VoID description or in the dataset itself
License machine redeable (query).output: string: the license if it can be recovered; -: the license is not indicated or the SPARQL endpoint is missing.

License human redeable.description: Detection of a license in the documentation of the dataset
License human redeable.output: True: the human readable license is indicated; False: the human readable license is not indicated; -: The SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Median latency.description: if an HTTP-request is not answered within an average time of one second, the latency of the data source is considered too low
Median latency.output: Median latency in milliseconds. Best value: <1000 ms

Median throughput.description: ino. of answered HTTP-requests per second
Median throughput.output: # of requests answered per second. Best value: Higher is better

Number of triples (metadata).output: integer: the number of triples; -: if the number of triples can't be retrieved

Number of triples (query).output: integer: the number of triples; -: The SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Number of entities.output: integer: the number of entities; -: if the number of entities can't be retrieved or the SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Number of entities counted with regex.output: number: the number of entities; -: if the number of entities can't be retrieved or the SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Number of property.output: integer: the number of properties; -: if the number of properties can't be retrieved or the SPARQL endpoint is missing.

Dataset update frequency.description: it corresponds to the 'stating the [...] frequency of data validation'
Dataset update frequency.output: []: the update frequency is not indicated; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of strings: the update frequency is indicated.

Degree of connection.description: detection of (a) interlinking degree, (b) clustering coefficient, (c) centrality, (d) open sameAs chains and (e) description richness through sameAs by using network measures
Degree of connection.output: integer: the degree of connection; -: if the dataset is not interlinked.

Clustering coefficient.description: detection of (a) interlinking degree, (b) clustering coefficient, (c) centrality, (d) open sameAs chains and (e) description richness through sameAs by using network measures
Clustering coefficient.output: float: the clustering coefficient; {}: if the dataset is not interlinked.

Centrality.description: detection of (a) interlinking degree, (b) clustering coefficient, (c) centrality, (d) open sameAs chains and (e) description richness through sameAs by using network measures
Centrality.output: float: the centrality; empty: if the dataset is not interlinked.

Number of samAs chains.description: detection of (a) interlinking degree, (b) clustering coefficient, (c) centrality, (d) open sameAs chains and (e) description richness through sameAs by using network measures
Number of samAs chains.output: False: no sameAs chains in the dataset; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; integer: number of sameAs chains in the dataset.

PageRank.description: analyzing page rank of the dataset
PageRank.output: float: the page rank; empty: if the dataset is not interlinked.

Dataset URL.input: (working) SPARQL endpoint or Metadata or VoID file
Dataset URL.output: url: the dataset url; absent: if the dataset url can't be retrieved

Is on a trusted provider list.description: checking whether the provider/contributor is contained in a list of trusted providers
Is on a trusted provider list.output: boolean: true if the provider is trusted; false: if the provider is not trusted

Trust value.description: Meta-information about the identity of information provider

Vocabularies.description: checking whether a list of vocabularies used in the dataset is provided
Vocabularies.output: []: if the vocabularies used are not indicated; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of vocabularies: if the vocabularies used are indicated.

Author (query).description: stating the author and his contributors, the publisher of the data and its sources
Author (query).output: []: if the author is not indicated; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of authors: if the author is indicated.

Author (metadata).description: stating the author and his contributors, the publisher of the data and its sources
Author (metadata).output: False: if the author is not indicated; string with authors: if the author is indicated.

Contributor.description: stating the author and his contributors, the publisher of the data and its sources
Contributor.output: []: if the contributors is not indicated; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of contributors: if the contributors is indicated.

Publisher.description: stating the author and his contributors, the publisher of the data and its sources
Publisher.output: []: if the publisher is not indicated; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of publishers: if the publisher is indicated.

Sources.description: stating the author and his contributors, the publisher of the data and its sources
Sources.output: string: the website, the name and the email of the source; False: if the sources are not indicated.

Signed.description: checking whether the dataset is signed
Signed.output: boolean: true if the dataset is signed; false: if the dataset is not signed.

Interlinking completeness.description: degree to which interlinks are not missing
Interlinking completeness.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. insufficient data: if the interlinking completeness can't be calculated.

New vocabularies defined in the dataset.output: []: if no new vocabulary is defined; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of new vocabularies: if at least a new vocabulary is defined.

New terms defined in the dataset.description: detection of whether existing terms from all relevant vo-cabularies for that particular domain have been reuse
New terms defined in the dataset.output: []: if no new term is defined; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of new terms: if at least a new term is defined.

Number of labels/comments present on the.description: no. of entities described by stating an rdfs:label or rdfs:comment in the dataset / total no. of entities described in the data.
Number of labels/comments present on the.output: integer: the number of labels/comments; -: the SPARQL endpoint is missing; False: if no label/comment is present or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Regex uri.description: detecting whether a regular expression that matches the URIs is present
Regex uri.output: [] or empty value: no regex provided; -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing; list of regex: if at least a regex is provided.

Presence of example.description: detecting whether examples of SPARQL queries are provided
Presence of example.output: False: if examples are not provided; True: if examples are provided.

Number of blank nodes.description: detecting the use of blank nodes
Number of blank nodes.output: integer: the number of blank nodes; -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing; False: if no blank node is present or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Deprecated classes/properties used.description: detection of use of OWL classes owl:DeprecatedClass and owl:DeprecatedProperty
Deprecated classes/properties used.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online.

Entities as member of disjoint class.description: no. of entities described as members of disjoint classes / total no. of entities described in the dataset
Entities as member of disjoint class.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Triples with misplaced property problem.description: Detection of a URI defined as a class is used as a property or a URI defined as a property is used as a class
Triples with misplaced property problem.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query. insufficient data: if the property cannot be recovered.

Triples with misplaced class problem.description: Detection of a URI defined as a class is used as a property or a URI defined as a property is used as a class
Triples with misplaced class problem.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query. insufficient data: if the class cannot be recovered.

Ontology Hijacking problem.description: detection of the redefinition by third parties of external classes/ properties such that reasoning over data using those external terms is affected
Ontology Hijacking problem.output: True: if ontology hijacking problem is detected; False: if ontology hijacking problem is not detected; -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Undefined class used without declaration.description: detection of classes and properties used without any formal definition
Undefined class used without declaration.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query. insufficient data: if the class cannot be recovered.

Undefined properties used without declar.description: detection of classes and properties used without any formal definition
Undefined properties used without declar.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query. insufficient data: if the property cannot be recovered.

Extensional conciseness.description: number of unique objects in relation to the overall number of object representations in the dataset
Extensional conciseness.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Intensional conciseness.description: number of unique objects in relation to the overall number of object representations in the dataset
Intensional conciseness.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Triples with empty annotation problem.description: labels, comments, notes which identifies triples whose propertyâ€™s object value is empty string
Triples with empty annotation problem.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Triples with white space in annotation(a.description: presence of white space in labels
Triples with white space in annotation(a.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Triples with malformed data type literal.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Functional properties with inconsistent.description: FP = 1 - num of triples of with inconsistent values for functional properties / num of triples
Functional properties with inconsistent.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Invalid usage of inverse-functional prop.description: IFP = 1 - num of triples of with inconsistent values for functional properties / num of triples
Invalid usage of inverse-functional prop.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Score.description: Overall quality score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual quality dimensions

Normalized score.description: Overall quality score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual quality dimensions.

Url file VoID.output: url: if VoID file url exists; - or empty: if the VoID file url does not exist

URIs Deferenceability.description: HTTP URIs should be dereferenceable, i.e. HTTP clients should be able to retrieve the resources identified by the URI
URIs Deferenceability.output: [0,1]. Best value: 1. -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query.

Availability score.description: Overall score for the availability dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual availability metrics scores

Licensing score.description: Overall score for the licensing dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual licensing metrics scores

Interlinking score.description: Overall score for the interlinking dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual interlinking metrics scores

Performance score.description: Overall score for the performance dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual performance metrics scores

Accuracy score.description: Overall score for the accuracy dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual accuracy metrics scores

Consistency score.description: Overall score for the consistency dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual consistency metrics scores

Conciseness score.description: Overall score for the conciseness dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual conciseness metrics scores

Verifiability score.description: Overall score for the verifiability dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual verifiability metrics scores

Reputation score.description: Overall score for the reputation dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual reputation metrics scores

Believability score.description: Overall score for the believability dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual believability metrics scores

Currency score.description: Overall score for the currency dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual currency metrics scores

Timeliness score.description: Overall score for the timeliness dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual timeliness metrics scores

Completeness score.description: Overall score for the completeness dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual completeness metrics scores

Amount of data score.description: Overall score for the amount of data dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual amount of data metrics scores

Interoperability score.description: Overall score for the interoperability dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual interoperability metrics scores

Understandability score.description: Overall score for the understandability dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual understandability metrics scores

Interpretability score.description: Overall score for the interpretability dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual interpretability metrics scores

Versatility score.description: Overall score for the versatility dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual versatility metrics scores

Security score.description: Overall score for the security dimension computed as a linear combination of the individual security metrics scores

SKOS mapping properties.output: integer: the number of mapping properties; -: if the SPARQL endpoint is missing or not online or error during the execution of the sparql query. False: if no mapping property is present.

metadata-media-type.description: checking whether data is available in different serialization formats
metadata-media-type.output: []: if no serialization format is provided; list of serialization formats: if at least one serialization format is provided

Availability of a common accepted Media.description: checking whether data is available in a rdf serialization format that is commonly accepted
Availability of a common accepted Media.input: (working) SPARQL endpoint or Metadata or VoID file
Availability of a common accepted Media.output: True: if at least one commonly accepted serialization format is provided; False: if no commonly accepted serialization format is provided; No dump available: if no dump is available;

F1-M Unique and persistent ID.output: 1: dataset registered in a search engine that provides a persistent DOI; 0: otherwise

F1-D URIs dereferenceability.output: # of dereferenceable URIs / total # of URIs. Best value: 1.

F2a-M - Metadata availability via standa.description: Metadata availability via standard primary sources
F2a-M - Metadata availability via standa.output: 1: SPARQL endpoint, searchable engine, or VoID/DCAT; 0: otherwise

F2b-M Metadata availability for all the.output: # of covered attributes / total # of attributes. Best value: 1.

F3-M Data referrable via a DOI.output: 1: metadata attach DOI(s) to data; 0: otherwise

F4-M Metadata registered in a searchable.description: Metadata registered in a searchable engine
F4-M Metadata registered in a searchable.output: 1: dataset registered in any search engine; 0: otherwise

F score.description: Overall FAIR score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual F subprinciples

A1-D Working access point(s).output: 1: operational SPARQL or accessible data dump; 0.5: accessible SPARQL endpoint or data dump; 0: otherwise

A1-M Metadata availability via working p.output: 1: sources discovered in F2a-M woek and contain metadata; 0: otherwise

A1.2 Authentication & HTTPS support.output: 1: security requirements can be discovered via SPARQL; 0: otherwise

A2-M Registered in search engines.output: 1: dataset registered in any search engine; 0: otherwise

A score.description: Overall Accessibility score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual A subprinciples

R1.3-D Data organized in a standardized.output: 1: SPARQL endpoint or valid data dump or OWL/RDFS; 0: otherwise

R score.description: Overall Reusability score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual R subprinciples

I1-M Metadata are described with VoID/DC.output: 1: published according to VoID/DCAT specs; 0: otherwise

I2 Use of FAIR vocabularies.output: # of FAIR vocabularies / total # of vocabularies. Best value: 1.

I3-D Degree of connection.output: 1: contains link to another dataset; 0: otherwise

I score.description: Overall Interoperability score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual I subprinciples

FAIR score.description: Overall FAIR score computed as a linear combination of all scores of the individual FAIR principles
